subject: AI & Agents
title: Synthetic Data as a Privacy Shield
description: A fast breakdown of Synthetic Data as a Privacy Shield for builders.

hook.text: Train a model on patient records without ever touching real patient data. Synthetic data makes it possible.

buildup.text: Synthetic data is generated to mimic real data's statistical properties without containing real individuals.

discovery.text: Generative models create realistic fake records that preserve patterns but protect identities.

twist.text: Poor synthetic data can still leak private information if the generator memorizes training examples.

climax.text: Combine synthetic data with differential privacy guarantees for robust protection.

punchline.text: Fake data, real insights, zero privacy risk.

quiz.question: What risk exists with synthetic data?
options: The generator can memorize and leak real data
It has no use in AI training
